titleStmt.title: The life and death of Dorcas VVherein, hee that pleaseth to reade, may finde both good direction for the ordering of his course: and a necessary warning to be prepared for his end. By Samuel Hieron.
titleStmt.author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Melch. Bradwood for Samuel Macham, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bullhead,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
